tool_description: Provides visual design recommendations for slides and materials based on audience preferences, content complexity, and presentation context.

brand_requirements.description: Whether corporate/organizational branding must be incorporated

error_messages: Invalid audience type: Must be 'executive', 'technical', 'creative', 'academic', or 'general'
Invalid content complexity: Must be 'simple', 'moderate', 'complex', or 'highly complex'
Invalid presentation format: Must be 'slides', 'handouts', 'poster', or 'digital display'
Missing required parameters: audience_type, content_complexity, and presentation_format are required
usage: Specify audience_type, content_complexity, and presentation_format. Optionally set brand_requirements and accessibility_needs booleans. The tool returns visual design recommendations.

color_scheme.description: Recommended color scheme approach for the audience and context

visual_elements.description: Types of visual elements to include (charts, images, icons, etc.)

design_principles.description: Key design principles to follow for this audience and content
